verses.text: It seemed good \w to|strong="H1868"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* he appointed over \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* a hundred \w and|strong="H4437"\w* twenty governors \w to|strong="H1868"\w* be over his whole \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4437"\w* three princes \w over|strong="H5922"\w* them, \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* Daniel \w was|strong="H1934"\w* one: \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* governors might give an \w account|strong="H5922"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* them, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* king might \w have|strong="H1934"\w* no trouble.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* excelled all \w the|strong="H1768"\w* princes, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* governors: \w because|strong="H4481"\w* \w a|strong="H2298"\w* greater spirit \w of|strong="H4481"\w* God \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w him|strong="H3052"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* thought \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w set|strong="H6966"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*: whereupon \w the|strong="H3606"\w* princes, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* governors sought \w to|strong="H5922"\w* find occasion \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w with|strong="H5922"\w* regard \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w could|strong="H1768"\w* find no cause, nor suspicion, \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* faithful, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* no fault, nor suspicion \w was|strong="H1934"\w* found \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* these men said: \w We|strong="H0116"\w* shall \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w find|strong="H7912"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* occasion \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1932"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, unless perhaps \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* law \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* God.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* princes, \w and|strong="H1841"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* governors craftily suggested \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* king, \w and|strong="H1841"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0560"\w* \w thus|strong="H1836"\w* unto him: King Darius, live \w for|strong="H1768"\w* ever:

\w All|strong="H5957"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* princes \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* kingdom, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* magistrates, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* governors, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* senators, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* judges \w have|strong="H4430"\w* consulted together, \w that|strong="H4430"\w* an imperial decree, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* an edict be published: \w That|strong="H4430"\w* whosoever shall ask any petition \w of|strong="H4430"\w* any god, \w or|strong="H4430"\w* man, \w for|strong="H5922"\w* thirty days, \w but|strong="H0116"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* thee, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, shall be cast into \w the|strong="H0116"\w* den \w of|strong="H4430"\w* lions.

\w Now|strong="H4430"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3861"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, confirm \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sentence, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* sign \w the|strong="H3606"\w* decree: \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* decreed \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Medes \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Persians may not \w be|strong="H0426"\w* altered, nor \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w man|strong="H0606"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* allowed \w to|strong="H1156"\w* transgress it.
\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* Darius \w set|strong="H6966"\w* forth \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w decree|strong="H1882"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* established it.

\w Now|strong="H4430"\w* when Daniel knew \w this|strong="H1836"\w*, \w that|strong="H0633"\w* is \w to|strong="H4430"\w* say, \w that|strong="H0633"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* law \w was|strong="H4430"\w* made, he went into \w his|strong="H3606"\w* house: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* opening \w the|strong="H3606"\w* windows \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* upper chamber towards Jerusalem, he knelt down three times a day, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* adored, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* gave thanks \w before|strong="H6903"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* God, \w as|strong="H6903"\w* he \w had|strong="H4430"\w* been accustomed \w to|strong="H4430"\w* do \w before|strong="H6903"\w*.

Wherefore \w those|strong="H1768"\w* men carefully watching \w him|strong="H6925"\w*, found \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w praying|strong="H6739"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w making|strong="H3046"\w* supplication \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1841"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w came|strong="H7284"\w* \w and|strong="H1841"\w* spoke \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* king concerning \w the|strong="H0116"\w* edict: O king, hast thou not decreed, \w that|strong="H0116"\w* every \w man|strong="H1400"\w* \w that|strong="H0116"\w* should make \w a|strong="H7912"\w* \w request|strong="H1156"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* any \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*, \w or|strong="H0426"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, \w for|strong="H1156"\w* thirty days, \w but|strong="H0116"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* thyself, O king, should \w be|strong="H0426"\w* cast into \w the|strong="H0116"\w* den \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* lions? \w And|strong="H1841"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* king answered \w them|strong="H0479"\w*, saying: \w The|strong="H0116"\w* word \w is|strong="H0426"\w* true according \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* decree \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Medes \w and|strong="H1841"\w* Persians, which it \w is|strong="H0426"\w* not lawful \w to|strong="H6925"\w* violate.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*: Daniel, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* children \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* captivity \w of|strong="H0426"\w* Juda, hath \w not|strong="H3809"\w* regarded thy \w law|strong="H1882"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w decree|strong="H1882"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* thou hast \w made|strong="H1156"\w*: \w but|strong="H3861"\w* three times \w a|strong="H1156"\w* \w day|strong="H3118"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* maketh \w his|strong="H5922"\w* prayer.

\w Now|strong="H0116"\w* \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* heard these words, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* very much grieved, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* behalf \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w set|strong="H7761"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* heart \w to|strong="H5922"\w* deliver \w him|strong="H6925"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w even|strong="H1768"\w* till sunset \w he|strong="H1768"\w* laboured \w to|strong="H5922"\w* save \w him|strong="H6925"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w those|strong="H1768"\w* men perceiving \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* design, said \w to|strong="H5922"\w* him: Know thou, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* law \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Medes \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Persians \w is|strong="H1768"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* no decree \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* hath \w made|strong="H7761"\w*, may \w be|strong="H1934"\w* altered.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* brought Daniel, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* cast \w him|strong="H6966"\w* into \w the|strong="H3606"\w* den \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lions. \w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* Daniel: Thy God, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* thou always servest, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* deliver thee.

\w And|strong="H6032"\w* \w a|strong="H0116"\w* stone \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w brought|strong="H0858"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* laid upon \w the|strong="H0116"\w* mouth \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w den|strong="H1358"\w*: \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* sealed \w with|strong="H0426"\w* \w his|strong="H7804"\w* own ring, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w with|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* ring \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w his|strong="H7804"\w* nobles, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* nothing \w should|strong="H4430"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* done \w against|strong="H1768"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w went|strong="H0858"\w* away \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* house \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w laid|strong="H7761"\w* himself down \w without|strong="H3809"\w* taking supper, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* meat \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w set|strong="H7761"\w* before him, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w even|strong="H1768"\w* sleep departed \w from|strong="H8133"\w* him.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* rising very early \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* morning, \w went|strong="H0236"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* haste \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* lions’ den:

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* coming near \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w den|strong="H1358"\w*, cried with \w a|strong="H0116"\w* lamentable voice \w to|strong="H4430"\w* Daniel, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* said \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w*: Daniel, servant \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* living God, hath thy God, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* thou servest always, been able, thinkest thou, \w to|strong="H4430"\w* deliver thee \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w lions|strong="H0744"\w*?

\w And|strong="H6032"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* answering \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w said|strong="H0560"\w*: O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, live \w for|strong="H1768"\w* ever:

My God hath sent his angel, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* hath shut up \w the|strong="H0116"\w* mouths \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* lions, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w have|strong="H4430"\w* not hurt me: forasmuch \w as|strong="H0116"\w* before him justice hath been found \w in|strong="H4430"\w* me: yea \w and|strong="H4430"\w* before thee, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w I|strong="H0116"\w* \w have|strong="H4430"\w* done no offence.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* exceeding glad \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* commanded \w that|strong="H1768"\w* Daniel \w should|strong="H4430"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* taken \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* den: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Daniel \w was|strong="H4430"\w* taken \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* den, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* hurt \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w*, \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* believed \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w his|strong="H7972"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* commandment, \w those|strong="H1768"\w* men \w were|strong="H1768"\w* brought \w that|strong="H1768"\w* bad accused \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* cast into \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lions’ \w den|strong="H1358"\w*, \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* children, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* wives: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* did \w not|strong="H3809"\w* reach \w the|strong="H3606"\w* bottom \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w den|strong="H1358"\w*, before \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lions caught \w them|strong="H0560"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* broke \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* bones \w in|strong="H0426"\w* pieces.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* Darius wrote \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H1400"\w*, tribes, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* languages, dwelling \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w whole|strong="H3606"\w* earth: PEACE be multiplied unto \w you|strong="H1768"\w*.

It \w is|strong="H1768"\w* decreed by me, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H1753"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* empire \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* kingdom \w all|strong="H3606"\w* men dread \w and|strong="H4430"\w* fear \w the|strong="H3606"\w* God \w of|strong="H4430"\w* Daniel. \w For|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w living|strong="H1753"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* eternal God \w for|strong="H1768"\w* ever: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom shall not be destroyed, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* power shall be \w for|strong="H1768"\w* ever.

\w He|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* deliverer, \w and|strong="H1763"\w* saviour, doing signs \w and|strong="H1763"\w* wonders \w in|strong="H0426"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H1763"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* earth: \w who|strong="H1768"\w* hath delivered \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* out \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lions’ den.

Now \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* continued unto \w the|strong="H1768"\w* reign \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Darius, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* reign \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Cyrus \w the|strong="H1768"\w* Persian.
